name: Prototype - Mission Demoliton
description:
This project is a Unity Example Game from the book Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping, and Development, 2nd Edition, by Jeremy Gibson Bond.

It is a physics-based casual game prototype, inspired by games such as Angry birds, Worms, Crossbows and Catapults, Scorched Earth, and so on.

You can find and download this project at GitHub.
